name: Ext_R4B_ImplementationGuide_de_re_fhirVersion
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.ImplementationGuide.definition.resource.fhirVersion for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ImplementationGuide.definition.resource.fhirVersion from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ImplementationGuide|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Versions this applies to (if different to IG)
element.definition: Indicates the FHIR Version(s) this artifact is intended to apply to. If no versions are specified, the resource is assumed to apply to all the versions stated in ImplementationGuide.fhirVersion.
element.comment: `ImplementationGuide.definition.resource.fhirVersion` maps to R4 `ImplementationGuide.definition.resource.fhirVersion`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
